DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics safety oral administration HIP0901 capsule Lipidilsupra tablet .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing HIP0901 Capsule With Lipidilsupra Tablet
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer , age 20 45 Informed investigational nature study voluntarily agree participate study Weight＞50kg , BMI ＞18kg/m2 ＜27kg/m2 subject Acute disease within 28 day prior start study drug administration Use prescription medication within 14 day prior Day 1 Use medication within 7 day prior Day 1 Has severe medical history hypersensitivity fibric acid derivative Participation another clinical study within 30 day prior start study drug administration
